desc: 55% all parameters (Earth), critical damage fills BB gauge, 150% critical damage, critical damage restores HP for 3 turns & 50%-75% damage counter

dictionary.lore:
A cane owned by Alphie, one of the twelve candidates sent to the realm of humans as part of a competition.

Always ready to lend a hand (or hoof), Goat made up for his small size with a big heart. Friend to those who look past his raggedly appearance, he does all he can to bring joy with the little things in lifeâ€”be it a simple mended boot for an orphan child, or a timely fix on a broken axle for an accident-prone journeyman.

After all, who else was capable of walking up a nearly vertical cliff?

name: Goat's Compassion
